Html:
Hi,

What kind of bbcode tag did you guys support? Are there any list that i can refer. I want to tag email. I tried using http://www.ecardmax.com/hoteditor/ but it doesnt work(low caps tag only)

I've added a BBCode tag reference. The tag email doesn't exist, but you can use the mailto protocol like so:
Send an [url=mailto:foo@test.com?subject=This%20is%20the%20subject&body=This%20is%20the%20body]email[/url]
